entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few flurries. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
